HomePage.title: Your brand, our products
HomePage.purpose: We develop partnerships in nutritional supplements for the physical and mental well-being of the whole family, through products that are responsible with our community and environment.
HomePage.feature_one: Our Experience and Reputation: 5 decades in the market, pioneers in nutritional supplements.
HomePage.feature_two: Innovation Capacity: Development of new products and innovative formulas.
HomePage.feature_three: Production Flexibility: Ability to adapt formulas and volumes according to client needs.
HomePage.join_us: Join thousands of companies already transforming their business with

ProductPage.title: Supplement Development
ProductPage.description: A scientific and rigorous approach to developing high-quality supplements.
ProductPage.subtitle: Our Development Process
ProductPage.survey_description: We begin with a meeting to understand your specific needs and product objectives. Our team analyzes every detail and provides you with a clear quotation that includes production costs, ingredients, and estimated times, ensuring you have all the information needed to make informed decisions.
ProductPage.formulation_description: At this stage, our team of experts works on creating customized formulas aligned with your requirements. We design the product and conduct pilot tests to assess its effectiveness, flavor, and texture. This ensures that the final result meets your expectations and those of your customers.
ProductPage.planing_description: Once the formula is approved, we proceed with detailed production planning. We coordinate resources with certified suppliers, schedule manufacturing, and ensure that each step of the process is carried out with the highest quality, safety, and efficiency. Our methodical approach minimizes errors and optimizes delivery times.
ProductPage.delivery_description: We conclude the process with a timely and organized delivery. We ensure all products meet quality standards before shipping. We keep you informed at every stage, guaranteeing that you receive your supplements ready for market in a reliable and efficient manner.
ProductPage.creative_lab_description: Our design laboratory combines science and engineering, is equipped with advanced technology, and adheres to good manufacturing practices (GMP). We conduct stability and safety tests, ensuring innovative and high-quality formulas. We foster a collaborative environment for rapid prototyping and customized adaptations.
ProductPage.team: Expert Team in New Product Design
ProductPage.team_description: Our multidisciplinary team of formulation and nutrition experts is dedicated to research and innovation. With a deep understanding of market trends, we develop products that meet high standards and resonate with consumers. Collaboration with our clients ensures that each product aligns with market demands and end-user needs.
ProductPage.discover_description: Contact us today to learn more about our customized formulas and how, with our expertise, we can help you take your brand to the next level. Request a free consultation and start transforming your ideas into high-quality products. We are here to help!

AboutPage.title: Our History
AboutPage.description: Our Experience and Reputation: 5 decades in the market, pioneers in nutritional supplements.
AboutPage.history: Founded in 1999 under the name Pasiguaro, with an initial team of 15 people, the company began its journey producing bran and granola. Over the years, it experienced steady growth, marked by milestones such as the launch of Fibratón in 2004 and Hyaluronic Acid (later UMARY) in 2007. In 2024, the company took a further step toward innovation by changing its name to AION and opening a Research Center, strengthening its focus on new product development in the nutritional supplements market.
AboutPage.integrity_description: I act with honesty and consistency.
AboutPage.responsibility_description: I say what I do and do what I say.
AboutPage.respect_description: I value and consider the diversity and dignity of everyone.
AboutPage.sense_of_urgency_description: I prioritize and act with speed and efficiency.
AboutPage.excellence_description: I continuously strive to improve established standards.
AboutPage.common_good_description: I act with a focus on collective interest.
AboutPage.communication_description: I share information clearly, openly, and in a timely manner.
AboutPage.teamwork_description: I collaborate and actively contribute to achieving common goals.
AboutPage.client_driven_description: I focus my actions on meeting and exceeding the expectations of internal and external clients.

TechPage.title: Our Technologies
TechPage.description: When we say that technology is in the DNA of our processes, we mean it!
TechPage.capsules_description: Capsules are a convenient and efficient way to consume nutritional supplements, providing a precise dose and protecting active ingredients.
TechPage.tablets_description: We use single-color and dual-color rotary compression machines; our installed capacity ensures large-scale supply to meet demand at all levels.
TechPage.powders_description: Powders have highly versatile and multi-product applications; you can explore our different packaging and portability options.
TechPage.liquids_description: The manufacturing process for liquid beverages involves a series of complex steps and a wide range of technologies to ensure that the final product is safe, high-quality, and meets customer requirements.
TechPage.gels_description: Mixing, gelling, viscosity control, and packaging technologies play a crucial role in creating effective and stable gels for pharmaceutical, cosmetic, or food applications.
TechPage.ointments_description: Ointments are a product based on the combination of active and inactive ingredients through an emulsion process.
TechPage.information_system_description: Track your product's process in real-time.
TechPage.Traceability_description: A system that will always allow you to know all the variables of your products.
TechPage.regulation_description: We comply with all regulatory requirements and more.
TechPage.staff_description: All staff members are certified in their processes.
